text:
Hi Bianca, how are things? I heard about these industry apprenticeships recently:

<https://www.screenskills.com/insight/news/kickstarting-careers-in-film-and-tv-with-the-screenskills-apprenticeship-programme/|https://www.screenskills.com/insight/news/kickstarting-careers-in-film-and-tv-with-the-screenskills-apprenticeship-programme/>

It’s a bit of a different area but they sounded quite interesting to me! Also might be of interest to someone you know if not to yourself.

attachments.title: Kickstarting careers in film and TV with the ScreenSkills Apprenticeship Programme  - ScreenSkills
attachments.fallback: ScreenSkills: Kickstarting careers in film and TV with the ScreenSkills Apprenticeship Programme  - ScreenSkills

text: I was also wondering if you had thought about what you might study at university if you didn’t go the apprenticeship route?
